name: @cycle/jsonp
description: A Cycle.js Driver for making HTTP requests through JSONP
author: Andre Staltz

scripts.test: npm run lib && npm run lint
scripts.browserify: npm run lib && ../node_modules/.bin/browserify lib/index.js --global-transform=browserify-shim --standalone CycleJSONPDriver --exclude xstream --outfile dist/cycle-jsonp-driver.js
scripts.dist: npm run lib && npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.version: npm run dist && npm run readme && npm run changelog
scripts.postversion: git add -A && git commit -m "release(${PWD##*/}): v$(cat package.json | ../node_modules/.bin/jase version)" && git push origin master && npm publish
